```{r, load-libs, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr) 
library(tidyr)
library(gt)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)
```

```{r, load-table, echo=F, message=F}
# Load table
os_table <- read_csv(here("data", "os_data.csv"))
```


```{r, add-entry, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# Add new entries
new_entry <- tibble(
  Authors = "Kleinschmidt", 
  Year = 2018, 
  Title = "Structure in talker variability: How much is there and how much can it help?", 
  Journal = "Pre-print", 
  `Data available` = 1, 
  `Code available` = 1, 
  Notes = "How do listeners cope with variability in the speech signal?", 
  Links = "[article](https://psyarxiv.com/a4tkn/)  [code](https://osf.io/3wcy5/)", 
  Citation = "Kleinschmidt, D. F. (2018, January 15). Structure in talker variability: How much is there and how much can it help?. https://doi.org/10.1080/23273798.2018.1500698"
) %>% 
  write_csv(., here("data", "os_data.csv"), append = TRUE)
```


```{r, create-table, echo=F}
# Create GT table (not working w/ github)
os_table %>% 
  select(., Citation, `Data available`, `Code available`, Notes, Links) %>% 
  kable(., format = "markdown") %>% 
  #kable_styling(., position = "center", font_size = 9, 
  #                 bootstrap_options = "striped") %>% 
  {.}
```
